item.title: [PI] ancient teleport, help
item.dc:creator: @Rye Rye
item.description:
@Rye wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:523093”]while looking up another help issue for somebody I ran across this in a post

you will just have to add your id instead of that

here is an example:

if(teleportType.equalsIgnoreCase("ectophial")) { c.stopMovement(); c.startAnimation(8939); c.teleTimer = 9; c.gfx0(1587); c.teleEndAnimation = 8941; }[/quote]But I’m not asking for anim, I am asking for GFX oh god! :W

Read full topic

here is an example:

if(teleportType.equalsIgnoreCase("ectophial")) { c.stopMovement(); c.startAnimation(8939); c.teleTimer = 9; c.gfx0(1587); c.teleEndAnimation = 8941; }

item.title: [PI] ancient teleport, help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

add a boolean to player, such as isTeleporting.
then in walking.java, add a check if the boolean is true, and if it’s true, the player can’t move. If false he can.
By default, it’s false. Set it to true when you teleport. Make sure that you set it back to false after the teleport or else the player won’t be able to move.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ancient teleport, help
item.dc:creator: @Rye Rye
item.description:
@Rye wrote:

Here is my tele code

[b]if (teleportType.equalsIgnoreCase(“ancient”)) {
c.startAnimation(1979);
c.teleGfx = 0;
c.teleTimer = 9;
c.teleEndAnimation = 0;
c.gfx0(392);
}

	}
}[/b]

I want the GFX Backwards Teleport too.

This is gfx code: 455, and need he can’t move while the gfx backwards teleport.

Send me the code with what i told you.

Read full topic
